definition: to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: The dissertation illustrates the characteristics of the postmodernist poetics from the following aspects:The Pelevin phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 论文从如下几个方面阐释作品的后现代主义诗学特征。

sentences.english: The post-modernists are basically critiques of modern life.
sentences.chinese: 后现代主义者对现代生活基本上持批评态度。

sentences.english: Foucault is one of the important representatives of post-modernism philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 福柯是后现代主义哲学的主要代表之一。

sentences.english: The three methods in the research on history of education cater to the needs of postmodernists.
sentences.chinese: “三条腿”的方法和特点迎合后现代主义者的口味。

sentences.english: The deconstruction of the postmodernism will inevitably result in the collapsing of semantics.
sentences.chinese: 后现代主义解构的结果必然会导致语意的断裂。

sentences.english: Sarah is often interpreted in the perspectives of Post-modernism and Feminism.
sentences.chinese: 研究者普遍从后现代主义和女性主义解读萨拉的形象。

sentences.english: Its three , Marcel Duchamp'anti-art thoughts and postmodernism art.
sentences.chinese: 其三，杜尚“反艺术”与后现代主义美术的关系。

sentences.english: Fowles is the famous novelist of postmodernism in the modern English literature.
sentences.chinese: 福尔斯是英国当代著名的后现代主义作家。

sentences.english: Consequently, it is historical and logic inexorable trend that the post-modernism cone into being.
sentences.chinese: 因此后现代主义文论的出现是一种历史和逻辑的必然。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is demonstrated that aesthetics after the post-modernist aesthetics should be based on practice.
sentences.chinese: 从而后现代主义美学之后的美学应立足于实践。

sentences.english: It is no coincidence that the postmodernists arose in tandem as the space of networks formed.
sentences.chinese: 后现代主义者随着网络空间的形成而崛起绝非巧合。

sentences.english: Back in the 1980s, people like Charles Jencks used to ask "What is postmodernism?"
sentences.chinese: 上世纪80年代，人们常问“什么是后现代主义？”

sentences.english: We hope to hold the advantages and disadvantages of Chinese oil-painting influenced by the post-modernism current of thought .
sentences.chinese: 以期把握后现代主义思潮对中国油画产生的利害关系。

sentences.english: Graves is an idol of the public who are keen on the Post-Modernism.
sentences.chinese: 格雷夫斯是热衷于后现代主义的公众心目中的偶像。

sentences.english: Many of POSTMODERNISM's allegedly principal qualities fit cyberpunk like a glove.
sentences.chinese: 据说许多后现代主义的主要特征完全和赛博朋克雷同。

sentences.english: Marx and Post-modernist both subvert traditional concept of subject.
sentences.chinese: 马克思与后现代主义都对传统主体概念进行了颠覆。

definition: Futurism (artistic and social movement of the 20th century)
